title: Sweetheart Devil
alternative_title: すいーとハートデビル
status: すいーとハートデビル
description:
Description :
        Kaori is a reserved girl who just got rejected by the boy she likes. Dejected, she goes to the library only to discover a book that allows her to summon a wish-granting demon. He will make her life better, but if she gets three wishes granted, she'll lose something important to her...
